title: She Tricked A Wealthy White Man – And Hid The Truth For Decades
description:
"She leaned over the crackling fire and watched each piece of paper from her lifetime of secrets burn slowly. White supremacy had forced her hand – but no one, especially not her boss, could ever find out what she had done."
Today on 2-Minute Black History, we learn the story of Belle de Costa Greene
